name: BROOM BROOM (Null Reference, Johax, Victor Buch, VeRonyKaa)
name_original: BROOM BROOM (Null Reference, Johax, Victor Buch, VeRonyKaa)
description:
"You better work bitch!" is how it all started when Glozelda misspoke and called her witch apprentice something very different. 

Glozelda immediately apologised but it was too late, the previously peaceful forest was now overrun by the three witch apprentices upset by their teachers harsh words. The battle of the four witches caused a commotion that awoke the whole forest. 

The witch hut started crazily running around unlike the bunny and the squirrel who set out for a lovely picnic to see how the fight would go down.
